part.Short: Evewy autumn, many guwch dwewwews hike to the Stiwtgwounds to puwchase the Faww winye. They wetuwn to theiw homes, steep wheat bwan in the winye, and weaven dough in theiw cway ovens. A few awe wuckiew; fungus gwove dwewwews nyeed onwy step outside to hawvest yeast, and fwiends to fungi nyeed onwy shake theiw yeast-widden appendages. (・`ω\´・)

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The twuffwe is encwusted with a winye-cowowed chaw wesidue bown of gases unknyown to the wowwd's suwfaces. Deep, deep in the eawth and acwoss the Pawe Sea was it smowdewed to succuwence. ;;w;;~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Seasonying the minced meat that's twapped undew the cwust is a smidge of yyffuw dust, shaved fwom the stawk of the eponymous mushwoom and finyewy gwound. The whowe mushwoom is much too powewfuw fow a mammawian psyche (consuming onye wouwd obwitewate the ego in mewe moments), but a smidge of dust on a tasty pie can wemind onye of onye's pwace in the cosmos. >w<

Eschewstadt =vewb:woaw= a sewmon unto the nyave, heaving the wind fwom the waftews down into the Sacwed Weww. Piwgwims twembwe benyeath the weight of =pwonyouns.possessive= voice and the cewuwean siwhouette of Shekhinyah behind =pwonyouns.objective=. ^w^

part.Short: "He who dons the chwome mantwe is as onye with =pwonyouns.possessive= Fathews." Awgent twestwes spiww fowth fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= scawp to =pwonyouns.possessive= waist. The pwiestwy mantwe of =pwonyouns.possessive= station is embwoidewed with a thousand stitches. part.Short: =pwonyouns.Subjective= =vewb:pweach:aftewpwonyoun= the chwomaic gospew of the Mechanyimists. Pwecious sawiva fwies fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= cwacked wips, but =pwonyouns.subjective==vewb:'we:aftewpwonyoun= too wapt in the music of =pwonyouns.possessive= wowds to nyotice. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wed wewts dot =pwonyouns.possessive= skin whewe the sowdewing iwon nyipped it. Wings of ash stain =pwonyouns.possessive= apwon, and =pwonyouns.possessive= vest pockets spwout stem-thin wods of gwass, stwands of wiwe, and metaw wivets. >w<

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An owd =pwonyouns.pewsonTewm= with sand and soot in =pwonyouns.possessive= beawd. Innyumewabwe baubwes and cuwios cwuttew =pwonyouns.possessive= wowkshop, shaded fwom the sunseaw by a sheet of metaw pitched upon the woof of =pwonyouns.possessive= hut. Onye of Awgyve's bushy eyebwows is pewpetuawwy cocked, though whethew that's owed to an insatiabwe cuwiosity ow fowehead mutation is unknyown. >w<

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hunched-back ancient wwapped in a bwack wobe. =pwonyouns.Possessive= smiwe is wawm. Pwotwuding fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= back is a stawk hidden undew a veiw. The stawk fowks into two hands with eyes in theiw pawms, and immediatewy you knyow why men fowwow Iwudad. (´・ω・\`)

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Onye staw-wibbonyed nyight, a way cat cwossed the mawshy woam and wandewed into Joppa. The watewvinye fawmews, wakenyed by the joyfuw cwies of a smaww giww, gathewed awound to wevew at the favowabwe omen and extow the genyewosity of the Beetwe Moon. Since then, Ctesiphus =vewb:have= spent =pwonyouns.possessive= days cuwwed undew the shade of bwinyestawk huts and sauntewing ovew diwt paths. So wong as =pwonyouns.subjective==vewb:'we:aftewpwonyoun= appwoached with cawe, =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:wewcome:aftewpwonyoun= the hands of fwiends and stwangews awike. >w< &mphosphowescent&y

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Yeaws of the desewt have taken theiw toww on =pwonyouns.possessive= body, but =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:command:aftewpwonyoun= youw eaw with =pwonyouns.possessive= voice wike few othew =pwuwawize==pwonyouns.pewsonTewm=, and you wondew what soveweignty =pwonyouns.subjective= might've come to wewe =pwonyouns.subjective= nyot bown a moistuwe fawmew. (・`ω\´・)

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The tattews of a sweat-stainyed kufiya thwash in the wind fwom whewe they hang about the fawmew's nyeck. Cwasped in =pwonyouns.possessive= gnyawwed, bwown hand is a cuwved vinyeweapew of iwon with which =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:cuww:aftewpwonyoun= moistuwe-swowwen wafews fwom the viwidian pwant cawwed watewvinye. ;;w;;

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pig fawmew swouches in the heat. A beaten, weathew hat is puwwed wow ovew =pwonyouns.possessive= eyes and sweat gwistens on the scwuffs of haiw on =pwonyouns.possessive= cheeks. =pwonyouns.Possessive= hands awe caked in mud and sawt. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pwonyouns.IndicativePwoximaw= bwawny, mustachioed =pwonyouns.pewsonTewm= =vewb:weaw:aftewpwonyoun= a white apwon stainyed with the juice of stawappwes. =pwonyouns.Possessive= sabwe haiw mats against the bwownyed skin of =pwonyouns.possessive= fowehead. Fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= weft foweawm hangs a wet wag, with which =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:scwub:aftewpwonyoun= the diwt fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= hands evewy few moments. (・`ω\´・)

part.Name: Description
part.Short: O, she doth pawe wed appwes by hew cheek! That cheek which doth pwocwaim the wite of spwing, And hewetofowe hath nyatuwe's gwand technyique, Nye'ew wipenyed wips so wed fwom which to sing. Begonye, fawse sun! I knyow thee fow a fwaud. Hew faiwest skin iwwuminyates the day. Aww gowd is bwass and e'ewy jewew is fwawed, When set beside the sums hew eyes might pay. The Spindwe, which fwom Omonpowch ascends, Must suwewy be hew wikenyess bwightwy wwought, And as a wikenyess, faiws to appwehend, The awtwess beauty that its makews sought. Did I knyow wove ow beauty? owo Nyo, fow shame! UwU Fow I knyew nyeithew 'tiw they spoke hew nyame. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Big Uawwaig shifts =pwonyouns.possessive= weight between =pwonyouns.possessive= hind and fowewegs. =pwonyouns.Subjective= =vewb:shake:aftewpwonyoun= dandew off the chipped suwface of the gweat cuwwing howns that spway fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= tempwes. Onye hand howds a puwwing bwade. The othew, wame and fwostbitten, weminds us that whiwe Mothew Nyatuwe may bestow spwendid gifts upon hew chiwdwen, she is stiww sistew to Cwuewty. (・`ω\´・)

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You gaze upon youw own wefwection in the wustwous chwome face of this conyicaw owb, which emits a cwackwing dwonye and showews azuwe spawks upon the fwoow. ;;w;;

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You gaze upon youw own wefwection in the wustwous chwome face of this conyicaw owb. It emits a hawmonyic dwonye. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: As stwange as it seems, the mayow's huwking fwame and awabastew fuw identify =pwonyouns.objective= unmistakabwy as an awbinyo ape. =pwonyouns.Possessive= fwanks have softenyed and swowwen, howevew, on account of a sedentawy wife unknyown to =pwonyouns.possessive= savage bwothews and sistews, and in pwace of contowted wage =pwonyouns.subjective= weaws an aspect of wefwective wondew. =pwonyouns.Subjective= =vewb:cwothe:aftewpwonyoun= =pwonyouns.wefwexive= in a cwude toga, a beaten, wide-bwimmed hat, and a wawking stick upon which =pwonyouns.subjective= doesn't wean but wathew bwandishes in a statewy mannyew. (´・ω・\`)

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Benyeath a manye of coawse haiw, Wawden Indwix's wips move without issuing fowth any sound, pewhaps in the fowmation of a witany invoked in the nyame of the vengefuw god =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:sewve:aftewpwonyoun=. The coawse haiw gwows in an unyintewwupted mass down =pwonyouns.possessive= towso, that of a human but bwoadew and mowe taut with muscwe than any man's, disappeawing onwy behind the sash of =pwonyouns.possessive= kiwt. But fow Mayow Nyuntu and the wawden =pwonyouns.wefwexive=, nyo onye knyows the ciwcumstances of Indwix's estwangement fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= kin, fow nyo onye dawes mention it west they dwaw the wawden's iwe. Onye of =pwonyouns.possessive= gweat cuwwing howns has been cweanwy cwoven fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= head, howevew. That same hown awong with sevewaw othews hang fwom a bewt swung wow about Indwix's hips, giving =pwonyouns.objective= the distinction of being the onwy wawwiow to beaw =pwonyouns.possessive= own appendage as a twophy. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Befowe you =vewb:wecwinye= =awticwe==pwonyouns.pewsonTewm= cwothed in weafy waiment, so svewte and stiww you mistake =pwonyouns.objective= fow the fawwen bwanch of a sickwy twee untiw you meet the gaze of =pwonyouns.possessive= cewuwean eyes. Upon cwosew scwutiny, you discewn the hiwts of =pwonyouns.possessive= twin swowds, Caswainyawd and Powwuxus, wising thwough the fowiage of =pwonyouns.possessive= cwoak and ovew =pwonyouns.possessive= shouwdews. =pwonyouns.Possessive= sywvan sashes, of which =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:weaw:aftewpwonyoun= sevewaw, awe stwewn with the eaws, cwaws, and howns of cweatuwes unfamiwiaw to you, and as you examinye them, =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:scwutinyize:aftewpwonyoun= you weawing an expwession that beaws quawities of both a smiwk and a scoww yet that is nyot quite eithew. ;;w;;

part.Short: Yuww, a sentient cucumbew vinye, puts =pwonyouns.possessive= woots down in a squat cway pot on the fwoow of =pwonyouns.possessive= hut. Mywiad wawes west on oaken shewves thwoughout the woom, and with =pwonyouns.possessive= tendwiws Yuww =vewb:exhibit= them to intewested customews by cwawwing awong an iwon twewwis. You nyotice that Yuww =vewb:cweep= towawd pwoducts awmost befowe you think of them; the gift of tewepathy affowds the spwightwy vinye a distinct advantage as a chandwew. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pwonyouns.IndicativePwoximaw= bwown-skinnyed =pwonyouns.pewsonTewm= =vewb:weaw:aftewpwonyoun= a fiwthy shift and =vewb:pewch:aftewpwonyoun= a basket on =pwonyouns.possessive= hip. =pwonyouns.Subjective= =vewb:stawk:aftewpwonyoun= thwough fowiage about the outskiwts of the viwwage gathewing edibwe mushwooms and keeping an instinctive eye on the chiwdwen at pway. (´・ω・\`)

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Muddy wags, tangwed haiw, skin caked with diwt. =pwonyouns.Subjective= =vewb:capew:aftewpwonyoun= about with awms fwaiwing wiwdwy. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A withe, bwown-skinnyed =pwonyouns.pewsonTewm= weawing onwy a woincwoth. Ovew onye bawe shouwdew a bow is swung; ovew the othew =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:cawwy:aftewpwonyoun= the pewt of some fowest anyimaw. At the sound of each bweaking twig ow abewwant biwd caww, =pwonyouns.possessive= body tenses and =pwonyouns.possessive= hand weaches fow the gwip of =pwonyouns.possessive= bow; =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:poise:aftewpwonyoun= =pwonyouns.wefwexive= to defend =pwonyouns.possessive= viwwage fwom those cwoven-hoofed savages that wouwd piwwage it. UwU

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This nyude, bwown-skinnyed figuwe awtewnyates between knyeewing wow befowe the shwinye of Obowoqowu and skuwking awound it obsewvantwy. =pwonyouns.Possessive= body is bwack with the diwt of the eawth, but =pwonyouns.possessive= face is unchawactewisticawwy cwean, and you nyotice evewy so often =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:uncowk:aftewpwonyoun= a watewskin that hangs awound =pwonyouns.possessive= nyeck, =vewb:moisten:aftewpwonyoun= =pwonyouns.possessive= hands, and =vewb:scwub:aftewpwonyoun= the gwime fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= cheeks and bwow. Obowoqowu's wowshipews deem this wite a mowe meanyingfuw use of theiw pwecious fweshwatew than even the quenching of thiwst, and in pwesenting unsuwwied faces to the idow of theiw ape god, they hope to pwopitiate him and gawnyew his favow and pwotection. >w<

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stonye idow of Obowoqowu stands twenty spans taww. Its nyamewess scuwptow chose to depict the ape god sitting cwoss-wegged with each of his thwee paiws of gawgantuan awms gwasping each othew. The idow is swathed in vinyes, its cawetakews ceding to nyatuwe save whewe the hewbage has thweatenyed to obscuwe Obowoqowu's gentwe countenyance. Wweaths of fwowews of evewy hue the fowest begets -- azuwe, chawtweuse, indigo, cawnyewian -- wittew the base of the shwinye, insignyificant offewings to what appeaws to be a cawwous god. >w<

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You stand nyot at the foot of a wintwy knyoww but benyeath a mountain of muscwe, swathed in bwanched fuw, that must be nyatuwe's cwownying jewew. Cast fwom the mowd of the gweat apes (ow pewhaps the exempwaw fwom which those apes wewe mowded), the wiving god diffews onwy in that =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:beaw:aftewpwonyoun= nyot two but six awms, each of which might be the fweeced bowe of an ancient yew. =pwonyouns.Possessive= fists awe of pwopowtions that suggest the might with which hoawy gods beat the mountains into shape when the eawth was young. Howevew, =pwonyouns.possessive= aspect beaws nyot a shwed of that divinye fuwy; =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:don't:aftewpwonyoun= wage but instead =vewb:sit:aftewpwonyoun= in contempwation of eons. ^w^

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thewe's a saying among the vintnyews who hoist theiw saiws towawd the Stiwt. 'Onye wose is faiw; five is death.' Indeed, when a singwe shaww swathes hew face and the Esthews awe onye, thewe is peace benyeath the Stiwt. But when she's joinyed by hew sistews, and scawwet wibbons thwash in the desewt aiw, thewe is onwy bwood and justice. UwU

They baww, and fwaiw, and wwithe fwom theiw mothews' gwasps, deaf to weassuwances of the pwant's medicaw potency. Snyipped and cwushed, the stem tastes acidic on theiw tongues and theiw faces contowt in chiwdwen's agony. But they sweep bettew at nyight, so theiw mothews say. UwU

part.Message: It's bland but for a film of fat. Why were the precursors so averse to knowing what they ate?

Description
part.Short: The stenciw on the tin depicts an anyimaw with cwaws, ow awe they hooves? Snyoods (ow howns? antwews? owo) puckew its nyose and bwow. Shaggy, knyotted fuw, ow wuffwed feathews, sheath it fwom the heat (ow cowd). >w<

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Phiwosophews wike to distiww things into theiw essences. When a pedagogue wawks his student thwough a vinyeyawd, he points to the wustwing weaves, the cwushed gwass, the empty sky, and he asks the student what is essentiaw about each of them. Unbeknyownst to both teachew and student, tucked away in a fowgotten cownyew of the wowwd, such an essentiaw bewwy gwows. >w<

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You feel unusually amorous for about half a day, during which time you'll fall in love with the first thing you look at. If you inject someone else, they'll fall in love with you and follow you around for 3000-3600 rounds. There's a 4% failure rate for every level higher they are than you.

part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +9 Strength +3 temporary hit points per level -25 move speed You cannot feel pain. You are immune to fear. You suffer 1% of your maximum hit points in damage each round (this damage cannot reduce you to below one hit point)
part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +6 Strength +2 temporary hit points per level -25 move speed You cannot feel pain. You are immune to fear. You suffer 1% of your maximum hit points in damage each round (this damage cannot reduce you to below one hit point)

part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 1001-1200 rounds Your movement speed is increased by 40% at night and underground but reduced by 20% in the daylight. +4 Agility at night and underground -3 Agility in the daylight You can see in the dark (radius 8). You suffer double damage from light-based attacks.
part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 1001-1200 rounds Your movement speed is increased by 25% at night and underground but reduced by 20% in the daylight. +3 Agility at night and underground -3 Agility in the daylight You can see in the dark (radius 8). You grow burrowing claws. You suffer double damage from light-based attacks.

part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 18-22 rounds You are immune to confusing attacks. You peer into your near future (you may revert to the point in time at which you first used this drug at the end of its duration).
part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 18-22 rounds You are immune to confusing attacks. Your activated mental mutations cool down twice as quickly.

part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +8 DV You gain the ability to phase out of the spatial dimension for 7-9 rounds.
part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +8 DV There is a 25% chance per round that you phase out of the spatial dimension for 1-3 rounds.

part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 10 rounds You recover 0.9 hit points per level (minimum 5) each round. At the end of the tenth round, you are purged of all short-term, biological debuffs and you regrow up to one severed appendage.
part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 10 rounds You recover 0.6 hit points per level (minimum 3) each round. At the end of the tenth round, you are purged of all short-term, biological debuffs and you regrow up to one severed appendage.

part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +100 electrical resist +50 cold resist -1 AV You receive a -5 penalty to bleeding saves. You only suffer 25% damage from bludgeoning attacks. You only suffer 25% damage from falling. You cannot be grabbed.
part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +100 electrical resist +25 cold resist -1 AV You receive a -5 penalty to bleeding saves. You only suffer half damage from bludgeoning attacks. You only suffer half damage from falling. You cannot be grabbed.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You gain either a permanent +1 bonus to a random attribute or one mutation point.

It depicts a majestic deew with onye hoof waised fwom the gwound, its humanwike eyes judging its suwwoundings and finding them wanting. The metaw pwaque on the base of the statue hasn't fawed weww ovew the centuwies, and the onwy gwyphs you can make out awe 'K', 'W', 'S', and 'H'. ^w^

As with =pwonyouns.possessive= nyewvous tension, the muscuwaw tonye and awewtnyess of the scout is even mowe heightenyed than those of the hindwen fawmews. Seeking pwedatows and intwudews, =pwonyouns.possessive= eyes dawt hithew and yon. (・`ω\´・)

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pwoud stance of this hindwen and the fiwe in =pwonyouns.possessive= eyes immediatewy set =pwonyouns.possessive= apawt fwom =pwonyouns.possessive= cewvidian kinfowk. Those shawp gween eyes peew out ovew the white-fwecked weddish fuw of =pwonyouns.possessive= cheeks, and =pwonyouns.possessive= spwit phiwtwum is the onwy deviation fwom the meticuwouswy nyeutwaw stwaight winyes of =pwonyouns.possessive= wips. Save fow the weathew bwacews on =pwonyouns.possessive= awms, nyothing =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:weaw:aftewpwonyoun= ow =vewb:wiewd:aftewpwonyoun= is of hindwen make: nyot the wong fowded cawbide bwade in onye hand, nyow the emewawd wight-daggew in the othew, nyot the scawy boots on aww fouw feet, nyow the chain haubewk dwaped ovew =pwonyouns.possessive= chest. Stiww, =pwonyouns.possessive= bwight emewawd eyes take in =pwonyouns.possessive= suwwoundings with mowe insight than anxiety, and =pwonyouns.possessive= fingews fwickew a compwex whythm in the aiw as =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:stand:aftewpwonyoun= idwe. =pwonyouns.Possessive= wightwy-fuwwed face moves wittwe, even as =pwonyouns.subjective= speaks. ;;w;;

Most stwiking about =pwonyouns.indicativePwoximaw= hindwen twadew is the fact that =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:diwect:aftewpwonyoun= a fwiendwy smiwe at evewyonye, even an intwuding outsidew. ;;w;;

part.Short: Aww withe muscwe and attentive vigiwance, Nyeewahind =vewb:become= =pwonyouns.possessive= occupation as the wawden of Bey Wah. =pwonyouns.Subjective= =vewb:weaw:aftewpwonyoun= an adapted suit of pwate awmow, its fauwds dwaping ovew =pwonyouns.possessive= stwong fwanks. But =pwonyouns.possessive= bwown eyes betway anyothew twuth: inside the body of this stout wawwiow hides an anxious and feawfuw faundwen. ;;w;;

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Though time has wizenyed and weakenyed the ewdew of Bey Wah, stiww =pwonyouns.possessive= gaze and voice awe as stwong as any hindwen in the hidden viwwage. Stwongew, in twuth, fow =pwonyouns.substantivePossessive= is the finyaw wowd on any mattew pewtainying to =pwonyouns.possessive= peopwe. In the nyame of twadition =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:awe:aftewpwonyoun= Hindwiawch; on the wips of =pwonyouns.possessive= chiwdwen =pwonyouns.subjective= is Gwand-Doe. To aww the viwwagews of Bey Wah, =pwonyouns.subjective= =vewb:awe:aftewpwonyoun= waw. (・`ω\´・)

part.Name: Description
